transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Haa Mukesh ji baat kar raha hu sir Mangaldeep multi services se.
Executive: haa Mukesh ji Imran baat kar raha tha mai senior manager IndiaMART Noida head office se kaise hai sir aap.
Customer: haa badhiya hai.
Executive: actually sir mera call karne ka purpose tha sir abhi aapka discussion hua hoga aapke account manager Avnish ke sath 12:30 baje ke aas pass hai na sir.
Customer: haa haa haa ji sir.
Executive: to aapka ek feedback aaya tha sir hamare pass whatsapp pe ek feedback aaya tha sir not satisfied ka sir to wahi janna chah rahe the sir ke kya problem aa gayi sir bataiye kya help kar sakte hai aapka.
Customer: Avnish ji ko maine pura 30 minutes explain kiya hai sir aap ek bar unse baat karenge.
Executive: haa maine pucha Avnish se sir to unka kehna tha mainly ki jo Avnish ne mujhe bataya sir ki might be koi employee shayad aapke pass job kar raha tha hai na sir unhone abhi shayad aapka company left kar diya hai sir aur shayad unhone apna khud ka company open kiya hai.
Customer: mera sara data copy kar liya same mere jaisa listing bana liya.
Executive: hmm hmm.
Customer: aur IndiaMART ne unko indication kar diya.
Executive: achcha to aapka pura ka pura detail unke pass hai ye aap keh rahe ho.
Customer: pura sara sara mera product list mera customer list sara copy karke le gaya banda aur IndiaMART pe register kar diya.
Executive: achcha to ye sir aap matlab aapka data leke gaya to sir aapne us pe legal koi action nahi liya sir aapne.
Customer: nahi mujhe thoda baad me pata chala mujhe abhi pata chala last mahine me.
Executive: hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: thik hai mai ye cheez ko samajh raha hu sir baki IndiaMART se dekhiye hum sir hamara jo department hai na sir wo servicing ka department hai sir hamare pass sir koi bhi client IndiaMART me aata hai na sir to aapko bhi pata hai sir ki hum aapko ek account manager provide karte hai sir jo services me aapko help karte hai sir ki man lijiye IndiaMART platform me mai koi bhi haa boliye na sir boliye na sir.
Customer: abhi mai unka business pura copy karta hu mere naam se register karta hu aap mere register kar denge na.
Executive: kaise unka business pura copy karoge matlab sir mai samjha nahi hu bataiye.
Customer: nahi abhi mai kisi ka aur ek aur aur kisi ka ek business copy karta hu aur IndiaMART se naye naye naye naye naam se register karta hu.
Executive: sir ek cheez bataiye aap sir ki sabse pehle sir hamare pass na sir koi bhi company onboard hoti hai na sir to hum sir sabse pehle to sir business business related documents lete hai sir sabse pehle jaise sir aapka GST certificate sir thik hai sir GST certificate ke baad sir aapka company ka signboard hona chahiye sir aapka warehouse proper hona chahiye sir aapke pass product hona chahiye sir.
Customer: inke pass ye sare hai kya dekhiye.
Executive: sir unhone agar hamare pass agar hamare pass unhone service liya hoga na sir to sabse pehle to unhone sir apna GST diya hoga sir aap mujhe unka company ka naam bataiyega sir to ek kam kijiye na sir aap unke sath hi kijiye mai mera listing close kar deta hu.
Executive: sir suniye to Mukesh ji mera baat to suniye sir aap uske company ka naam to bataiye sir aur dekhiye sir mai ye cheez aise nahi over the call mai aapko bata raha hu sir.
Customer: aadha ghanta pura maine pura sunaya hua hai aadha ghanta to aap.
Executive: mai samajh gaya sir aap unke mujhe resolution chahiye mujhe nahi ki 10 bar call chahiye mujhe resolution chahiye.
Executive: Mukesh sir Mukesh sir ek cheez mai aapko bolu sir aapne sir half an hour Avnish se baat kiya sir aapka problem tha sir aapne apna problem ke regarding hi hamare pass not satisfied ka feedback open kiya sir thik hai agar mai aapko problem ko agar mai mujhe agar sort out nahi karna rehta sir to mai aapko connect nahi kar sakta tha sir mai directly Avnish se baat kar sakta tha.
Customer: unko aadha ghanta explain kiya aapko aadha ghanta explain karunga aur aapke boss ko aadha ghanta explain karunga aur unke boss ko aadha ghanta explain karunga to mai ye cheez ke liye thodi baitha hu yaha pe.
Executive: sir mai aapko aapko pata hona chahiye ki hum hum register kar dete hai to aap kar dijiye register mai mai mai kuch nahi bolunga.
Executive: Mukesh ji Mukesh ji mera wo mera wo hak hai not satisfied hu I am not satisfied with IndiaMART.
Executive: sir sir suniye to mera baat to suniye sir aap aapka ek employee aapke pass.
Customer: maine aadha ghanta aapko sari baate sunaya hai aap unse baat kar lijiye ek bar aur mujhe resolution dijiye na ki mujhe baki reason dijiye.
Executive: sir resolution ke regarding hi maine aapko call kiya na Mukesh ji.
Customer: resolution nahi dena hai to aap chhod dijiye.
Executive: sir baat karenge tabhi to resolution nikalega na sir.
Customer: agar maine unse feedback liya sir sir mai wo cheez nahi keh raha hu mai mai wo cheez nahi keh raha hu sir mujhe resolution ke regarding hi baat karna hai aapko hum kya solution provide kar sakte hai sir tabhi maine aapko call kiya sir.
Customer: listing wo band karo tabhi mujhe baat karo.
Executive: mera baat to suniye sir mera baat sir aise suddenly hum kisi ka listing to band nahi kar sakte na sir kal ke din sir ek cheez band kar do sir.
Executive: Mukesh ji Mukesh ji ek cheez Mukesh ji kal ka baki hai mera wo bhi band kar do mera.
Executive: Mukesh ji ek cheez mujhe bataiye sir kal ke din koi dusra aadmi call karega mujhe sir koi bhi buyer sir ya supplier mere pass call karta hai ki nahi mujhe iska company aap band kar do unhone mere sath aisa aisa kiya hai sir to mai unka sir aap unse baat turant sunke.
Customer: fraud nahi laga sakte aap ye fraud nahi laga sakte.
Executive: aapne mujhe abhi kya bataya sir ki aapka employee tha sir unhone aapke pass job chhod ke gaya sir aap keh rahe ho ki unka listing mai band kar du sir thik hai sir ye cheez aapka concern hai sir us cheez ko sabse pehle to sir pehli baat to hum verify karenge sir isiliye maine aapko pucha sir ki unka sir aap apna company ka naam bataiye sir possible hoga to mai video meeting me bhi dikha dunga sir ki unhone kya kya documents apne provide kiye hai sir.
Executive: ye cheez ho sakti hai na sir agar aap suddenly bolo nahi aap unka bhi company band kar do.
Customer: Kalyani enterprises Aurangabad.
Executive: ek bar registered number bataiyega sir.
Customer: kiska mera.
Executive: nahi nahi unka Kalyani.
Customer: nahi registered number mere pass nahi hai Kalyani enterprises Aurangabad.
Executive: ek minute sir mai check kar leta hu.
Executive: to Kalyani enterprises se to hamare pass bahut sari company hai Aurangabad.
Customer: Aurangabad.
Executive: Mumbai.
Executive: Mumbai sir dekh leta hu sir.
Executive: unka naam Mahesh hai kya sir.
Customer: nahi nahi nahi Mahesh nahi Sandeep Khidke aap product dekhiye na product.
Executive: ek minute verify kiya tha abhi Avnish ji ne verify kiya tha aap Avnish ji se ek bar baat kar lijiye.
Executive: ek minute.
Executive: please thoda sa kam karne dijiye sir kyuki mai din bhar wahi baat kar raha hu.
Executive: thik hai to agar mai ek bar check kar leta hu haa mai fir mai aapko haa fir mai aapko 3 baje ke aas pass connect karta hu thik hai sir.
Customer: tab.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's employee copied data, registered on IndiaMART.

- Wants IndiaMART to remove the listing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained verification process for new listings.

- Executive asked for the company name to investigate.

- Executive offered to call back at 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and call back at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- listing, data copy, resolution, verification, fraud
